name: preschool-erp
description: Pre-School ERP System with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npm run typecheck && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
